name: Harper Lee
biography: Harper Lee was an American novelist widely known for To Kill a Mockingbird, published in 1960.

name: George Orwell
biography: George Orwell was an English novelist, essayist, and critic most famous for his novels '1984' and 'Animal Farm'.

name: Jane Austen
biography: Jane Austen was an English novelist known primarily for her six major novels, which interpret, critique and comment upon the British landed gentry at the end of the 18th century.

name: Herman Melville
biography: Herman Melville was an American novelist, short story writer, and poet. He is best known for his novel 'Moby-Dick' and his novella 'Billy Budd'.

name: Leo Tolstoy
biography: Leo Tolstoy was a Russian writer who is regarded as one of the greatest authors of all time. He is best known for his novels 'War and Peace' and 'Anna Karenina'.

name: J.R.R. Tolkien
biography: J.R.R. Tolkien was an English writer, poet, philologist, and academic, best known as the author of the high fantasy works 'The Hobbit' and 'The Lord of the Rings'.
